title: 路由器超级管理密码获取
content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"获取路由器mac地址，有两种方式，在链接内网的情况下，可以执行 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"arp -a"},{"type":"text","text":" 获取网关ip的mac地址，也可以直接查看路由器背面获取Mac地址11111"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"临时打开telnet, 打开地址 http://192.168.1.1/telnet?enable=1&key=${MAC地址}，key参数是MAC地址去掉冒号，全大写，若开启成功，能看到 Open telnet success! 字样"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"telnet进入路由器，输入"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"telnet 192.168.1.1"},{"type":"text","text":", 用户名 root, 密码为 Fh@${MAC地址后6位全大写}"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"获取超级管理密码，telnet进入路由器后，执行命令 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"load_cli factory"},{"type":"text","text":", 然后执行 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"show admin_pwd"},{"type":"text","text":", 会显示出来超级密码"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"打开超级管理登录页面，打开路由器进入 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://192.168.1.1/cu.html"}}],"text":"http://192.168.1.1/cu.html"},{"type":"text","text":", 输入管理员密码即可进入后台"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"}}]}
